name: glasto-astro
title: Glasto Astro
desc: Glasto Astro is a minimalist SaaS template built with Astro and Tailwind CSS. Its modern design and fast load times ensure a seamless user experience.
article:
Glasto - A Sleek, minimalist theme for SaaS and startups. Built with Astro and Tailwind CSS for intuitive UX and fast loading, ideal for high-conversion websites.


Key Features

  • 15+ Complete SaaS Pages
  • 99/100 Google PageSpeed Score on Desktop
  • Highly customizable (Color, Font, Menu, Social Links, SEO Meta Tags, etc.)
  • Built with Astro v5 and Tailwind CSS v4
  • Netlify & Vercel setting pre-configured
  • Support Disqus Comments
  • Write and update content in Markdown / MDX
  • MDX components auto-import
  • Fully responsive on desktops, tablets, and smartphones
  • Clean folder structure
  • Simple and easy development environment setup
  • Compatible with all modern browsers
  • SEO Friendly
  • Animation on scroll
  • Free Google fonts
  • Lifetime free updates
  • Detail Documentation

Pages


  1. Home
  2. Company
  3. Pricing
  4. Integration
  5. Case Study
  6. Case Study Details
  7. Contact
  8. Request a Demo
  9. Changelog
  10. Blog
  11. Blog Details
  12. Reviews
  13. 404

Special Features


  1. AOS Animation
  2. Mega Menu

Some Packages Version


  1. Astro: 4.12.2
  2. Tailwind CSS: 3.4.7
  3. Typescript: 5.5.3
